title: The portraiture of hypocrisie, liuely and pithilie pictured in her colours wherein you may view the vgliest and most prodigious monster that England hath bredde.
author: Bate, John, M.A.
publisher: Imprinted by Robert Robinson, for Iohn Dalderne,
notes: John Bate may be the same person as John Batt (STC).
Running title reads: A dialogue betweene a Christian and an atheist.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Chicago. Library.
